content: lion brand pattern # 60040 skill level easy size one size 13 x 80 in / 33 x 203 cm note shrug is very stretchy and will fit a wide range of sizes 790-375 homespun yarn candy apple 4 balls crochet hook - size k-10 5 6 5 mm photos illustrate different ways to wear the shrug see 50735 criss-cross shrug 1 for the knit version 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/criss-cross-shrug
